questions.question: What type of core offer do you have or plan to sell?
questions.subtext: Your lead magnet should connect directly to what you're selling

options.label: Software / SaaS
options.description: Online tool, app, or software platform

options.label: Service / Done-For-You
options.description: You do the work for clients

options.label: Membership / Community
options.description: Ongoing access to community or content

options.label: Not Sure Yet
options.description: Still figuring out my core offer

questions.question: How comfortable are you with technical tools and software?
questions.subtext: This affects what type of lead magnet you can realistically create

options.label: Very Technical - Can Build
options.description: Can code or build software tools

options.label: Comfortable - Can Use Tools
options.description: Can use no-code tools and platforms

questions.question: How much time can you invest in creating your lead magnet?
questions.subtext: Some lead magnets take days, others take months to create

questions.question: What budget do you have for creating your lead magnet?
questions.subtext: Consider tools, design, development, and delivery costs

options.description: Can hire help for specific parts

questions.question: How comfortable are you creating educational content?
questions.subtext: Writing guides, recording videos, creating training materials

questions.question: Can you deliver personalized services or consultations?
questions.subtext: Some lead magnets require your time for personalized delivery

options.label: Yes - Have Capacity Now
options.description: Can dedicate time to personalized delivery

options.label: Yes - But Limited Capacity
options.description: Can do some, but not unlimited

questions.question: How well do your prospects understand their problem?
questions.subtext: This determines whether you need to reveal the problem or solve it

options.label: Don't Know They Have Problem
options.description: Need to make them aware first

options.label: Know Problem, Not Solution
options.description: Searching for how to solve it

options.label: Know Problem and Solution
options.description: Just need to experience it works

questions.question: What's your primary goal for the lead magnet?
questions.subtext: Different goals require different lead magnet types

options.label: Diagnose Specific Problem
options.description: Help them see what needs fixing

questions.question: How important is scalability (delivering to many people)?
questions.subtext: Scalable lead magnets deliver automatically, others require your time

options.label: Critical - Need to Scale
options.description: Must work for hundreds or thousands

options.label: Important But Not Critical
options.description: Want scale but can start manual

questions.question: What existing assets do you have that could become a lead magnet?
questions.subtext: The best lead magnets often repurpose what you already have

options.label: Have Software or Tool
options.description: Built or can access a software tool
